name: AT&T Jive Earbuds with In-Line Mic, Assorted Colors

reviews.name: AT&T Jive Earbuds with In-Line Mic, Assorted Colors
reviews.reviewText: Best Sounding Earphones on market today for the cost and when I use for telephone calls the microphone quality is terrific, people never have trouble hearing me, and they feel good in your ears (they dont hurt like other do). I bought my first pair 2 yrs ago and always wanted to get a couple more pairs. They don't tangle and are really durable. LOVE LOVE LOVE them so much I just bought 4 more pairs. Highly recommend these!!
reviews.title: GREAT Earphones

reviews.name: AT&T Jive Earbuds with In-Line Mic, Assorted Colors
reviews.reviewText: These fit in my ear better than most, have really good sound and do a pretty good job at blocking outside noise. I've only used them for my tablet while watching movies so I don't know how they would work if using on a phone. If something ever happened to them I would buy another pair.
reviews.title: nice headphones for the price

reviews.name: AT&T Jive Earbuds with In-Line Mic, Assorted Colors
reviews.reviewText: Fantastic sound quality for the $. Bass is Deep and highs are clear. Earpieces are Very comfortable and cancel out noise around you. Mic button is Very convenient for pausing, skipping, and replaying songs.
reviews.title: Buy them! PERIOD.

reviews.name: AT&T Jive Earbuds with In-Line Mic, Assorted Colors
reviews.reviewText: Great pair of headphones for the price. The sound is very sharp and clean...can't really ask for much more than that. If you want good sound at a cheap price, then these are for you. My children are always taking mine, and somehow I never get them back. These are cheap enough that I can replace them often, without compromising on the sound quality.
reviews.title: Music to my ears!
